title: LOL Client Freezing - Causing My Computer To Freeze And Crash. Please Help!
body: After opening LOL and loging in my pc freezes and i cant do anything, but force restart. Im on windows 7

replies.body: Hey there, that's a pretty unsettling issue.  It might be best to stick to customs for now to troubleshoot.  There could be some hardware or driver problems causing this, but I recommend going over each step of our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for now to help rule out possibilities.  Let me know if that helps.
